group_1.textRight: ...Knew you'd be here.
Let's go back to the base. Yuna and the others@are also waiting for you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Fine. You didn't have to come here to say that...

group_1.textRight: You know, both Yuna and Juri already understand...
...that you're only hesitant to take the plunge@because you're so kind...

group_1.textLeft: I think the two of them are getting fed-up with me,@don't you?
Besides... I'm not kind.
I'm just a cowardâ€”@scared... of robbing away someone's future...

group_1.textRight: Future...?

group_1.textLeft: Before we manage to take revenge on the people of@Kamihama, more of our companions may pass away...
And even if we do exact our revenge...
We still may not get the future we want...
Will the True End be a Happy End?
There's no promise of that...
So, I'm scared...

group_1.textRight: You... you're kind, after all.
That's why everyone from Janomiya adores you, Ao.

group_1.textLeft: Wha...?
Everyone... why are you all here...?
...Just kidding~!
It was Hikaru who told you to come, right?

group_1.textRight: I was certain that Ao would be staying here.
Um, Ao!

group_1.textLeft: What is it~?

group_1.textRight: The date for Ao and the others to leave for@Kamihama has been decided, right?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh... about that...

group_1.textRight: At last, this day is coming...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: We'll be there after you!
Let's avenge them together!
We'll get our revenge by robbing away the@Automatic Purification System!
I-I'll also be going with you all...!@Even though I'm a bit... scared...

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to push yourself, you know~?

group_1.textRight: That's not true...!
I may be scared, but I'll do my best if it will@bring peace to Futatsugi...!
Besides... as long as Ao is there, I'll be fine...!

group_1.textLeft: What... me?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I have nothing to be afraid of@when I'm with Ao...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: ...What do you think, Ao?
Ao, you're strong.
Everyone believes in you and has hope in you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's make sure we all get...@our revenge on Kamihama.

group_1.narration: With such cowardice, inability to bear pain,@fear of losing my comrades and my future,@I'm by no means a strong person...
But, for the sake of everyone,@I have to stay strong.
I will do whatever it takes@to get hold of the Automatic Purification System,@and win this game@with all the Magical Girls of Futatsugi.
To survive and prevail in this game,@I'm willing to sacrifice anything.
The Player regains the Skill Card "RESOLVE"@and further evolves it to "RESOLVE++".
Once she also regains the Skill Card "TRUST",@she will be able to try again@to unlock the next Area.
